price: Isheen muka hundee ibidda jahannam keessaan baatuudha.
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
